titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-70, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 23.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 190.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 223 - 203 (Roll no. 139).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/10/2003--Introduced. Waives a requirement of a clause of rule XIII to provide for the consideration of a conference report to accompany H. Con. Res. 95 (establishing the Congressional budget for FY 2004 and setting forth appropriate budgetary levels for FY's 2003 and 2005 through 2013).
